conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a cutaway/isometric 3D model with extruded walls, visible thickness, and an elevated viewpoint showing interior volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear 3D extrusion with thickness and readable interior volume; cutaway is clean. Minor simplification/softness in corner/junction detailing and openings reduces perfect geometric crispness.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall layout does not tightly match the provided 2D plan crop: the 2D shows a distinct kitchen+dining+utility+WC+central hall/breakfast configuration, while the 3D arrangement appears reinterpreted (large open room plus additional room with bed) and several plan-specific partitions/room shapes are not preserved.

interior_elements.notes: Generic kitchen counters/island-like blocks and some furniture massing exist, but fixtures corresponding to the 2D plan (WC/bath/utility equipment) are not clearly represented; a bed appears that is not indicated in the shown 2D crop.

visual_clarity.notes: Good readability of walls vs floor and clean background. Lighting is adequate though somewhat flat; openings/windows are visible but not detailed enough to verify exact placement.

detected_errors.description: Noticeable layout distortion vs 2D: room configuration/partitioning does not preserve the kitchen-dining-utility-WC-central hall relationships and shapes shown in the plan crop.
Plan-specific rooms (e.g., clearly labeled WC and utility room area) are not clearly identifiable as matching enclosed spaces in the 3D model.
Door/window locations and sizes cannot be verified as matching the 2D plan; openings appear simplified and likely not placed per the plan.
Furniture program appears inconsistent with the provided 2D crop (e.g., a bed appears where the crop indicates service/kitchen/dining zones).

summary: A true cutaway 3D model was produced, but the generated layout and room program do not faithfully match the geometry and room configuration shown in the 2D plan crop.
